channel.title: Comments on: How to Identify Scam IDOs

item.title: By: Dr. Drew Miller
item.dc:creator: Dr. Drew Miller
item.description: It looks like AXenS has finished their ICO and disappeared. Website over a month ago and already out of date, no contact information on the contacts page, no news on them at all. Looks like a scam ICO--and one promoted by Applicature.
item.content:encoded: It looks like AXenS has finished their ICO and disappeared. Website over a month ago and already out of date, no contact information on the contacts page, no news on them at all. Looks like a scam ICO–and one promoted by Applicature.
